title: Create or Update Contact
description: Update an existing marketing contact or create them if they don't exist.

list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: ID of the marketing contact list you want the contact added to.

email.title: Email Address
email.description: The primary email for the contact.

alternate_emails.title: Additional Amail Addresses
alternate_emails.description: Additional emails associated with the contact.

address_line_1.title: Address Line (1)
address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.title: Address Line (2)
address_line_2.description: Optional second line for the address.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country of the contacts address. Accepts full name or abbreviation.

postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: The postcode, post code, Eircode, PIN code or ZIP code.

state_province_region.title: Region
state_province_region.description: The state, province, or region of the contacts address.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Object with custom data to associate with this contact.
